word_mean: 变形，变异：形式或结构的改变。由一种形式转变为另一形式。在肿瘤学中则指正常细胞向癌细胞的演变。在真核生物中指细胞培养中正常细胞向恶性细胞的转变
体外培养的真核细胞转变为生长失控状态，类似于肿瘤细胞的生长。

sentence.Network_en: The transformation of American sea power began in 1940.
sentence.Network_cn: 美国海军力量的彻底转变始于1940年。

sentence.Network_en: In the last five years he's undergone a personal transformation.
sentence.Network_cn: 过去5年里他整个人发生了全新的转变。

sentence.Network_en: This new transformation is at least as consequential as that one was.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一新的转变至少和那次一样重要。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, or from late Latin transformatio(n-), from the verb transformare (see transform)

entry.def: To transform something into something else means to change or convert it into that thing.

example.ex: Your metabolic rate is the speed at which your body transforms food into energy...
example.tran: 新陈代谢率是身体把食物转换为能量的速度。

example.ex: Delegates also discussed transforming them from a guerrilla force into a regular army.
example.tran: 代表们还讨论了把他们从游击队武装改造为正规军的问题。

entry.tran: 改善;使改观;使改头换面
entry.def: To transform something or someone means to change them completely and suddenly so that they are much better or more attractive.

example.ex: The Minister said the Urban Development Corporation was now transforming the area...
example.tran: 部长声称城市开发公司如今正使该地区改头换面。

example.ex: A cheap table can be transformed by an interesting cover…
example.tran: 一块趣味盎然的桌布就能使一张廉价桌子面目一新。

means.word_mean: 2. (mathematics) a function that changes the position or direction of the axes of a coordinate system
3. a rule describing the conversion of one syntactic structure into another related syntactic structure
4. (genetics) modification of a cell or bacterium by the uptake and incorporation of exogenous DNA
5. the act of changing in form or shape or appearance;

sentences.sentence: "a photograph is a translation of a scene onto a two-dimensional surface"

auth_sentence.content: For beneath the affair was a great historical transformation.
auth_sentence.res_content: For beneath the affair was a great historical transformation.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For beneath the affair was a great historical transformation.

auth_sentence.content: The signs of transformation in West Point are everywhere.
auth_sentence.res_content: The signs of transformation in West Point are everywhere.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The signs of transformation in West Point are everywhere.

auth_sentence.content: Nothing magical is being offeredsno mysterious transformation of reality.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nothing magical is being offeredsno mysterious transformation of reality.

Sentence.sentence: What it does mean is that the book business will go through a transformation in the next decade or so more profound than any it has seen since Gutenberg introduced printing from moveable type in the 1450s.

means.word_mean: 变化, 弯形, 变质, 转变

sentences.en: a transformation that was little short of miraculous
A startling cultural transformation occurred in post-war Britain.
sentences.cn: 战后英国的文化出现了令人惊讶的变化。

sentences.en: Going to college brought about a dramatic transformation in her outlook.
sentences.cn: 上大学使她的观念发生了巨大的变化。

sentences.en: But the breadth of the economic transformation can’t be measured by numbers alone.
sentences.cn: 但不能只靠数字来衡量经济变化的程度。

sentences.en: He was struggling to make the transformation from single man to responsible husband.
sentences.cn: 他正在努力使自己由单身汉变为可靠的丈夫。
